CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.DATASET_FILE_MAX_SIZE
CONFIG.name: DATASET FILE MAX SIZE

CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.API.DATASET.MAX_ROWS_NUMBER

CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.EXECUTION.PARAMETERS.statePersistenceEnabled
CONFIG.name: Parameter state persistence enabled
CONFIG.description: if true the default value for each parameter will be set automatically equal to the last value selected by the user

CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.EXECUTION.PARAMETERS.statePersistenceScope
CONFIG.name: Parameter state persistence scope
CONFIG.description: if equals SESSION the parameter state will be saved in session (i.e. reseted after each logout). If equals to BROWSER the parameter state will be saved in a cookie and preserver over different login sessions

CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.EXECUTION.PARAMETERS.mementoPersistenceEnabled
CONFIG.name: Parameter memento persistence enabled
CONFIG.description: if true the last N values selected from a parameter by the user will be stored and used as selection shortcut for future executions

CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.EXECUTION.PARAMETERS.mementoPersistenceScope
CONFIG.name: Parameter memento persistence scope
CONFIG.description: if equals SESSION the parameter memento will be saved in session (i.e. reseted after each logout). If equals to BROWSER the parameter memento will be saved in a cookie and preserver over different login sessions

CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.EXECUTION.PARAMETERS.mementoPersistenceDepth
CONFIG.name: Parameter memento persistence depth
CONFIG.description: The number of values to save into the memento object associated to each parameter

CONFIG.label: KNOWAGE.SCHEDULER.scheduleIterationLimit
CONFIG.name: Parameter schedule iteration limit
CONFIG.description: The number of max iterations on parameter values allowed for each schedule

CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.DATE-FORMAT-SERVER.format
CONFIG.name: SERVE DATE FORMAT
CONFIG.description: Date format for communications with the server (both on sending and receiving) format attribute is for server side services, see java.text.SimpleDateFormat for details, while extJsFormat is for ExtJs client, that use another standard, see http://extjs.com/deploy/dev/docs/. IF YOU CHANGE ONE FORMAT YOU MUST CHANGE THE OTHER ONE ACCORDINGLY.

CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.DATE-FORMAT.format
CONFIG.name: DATE FORMAT
CONFIG.description: Date visual format if language is not found

CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.DATE-FORMAT.extJsFormat
CONFIG.name: EXTJS DATE FORMAT
CONFIG.description: Date visual format if language is not found

CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.DATE-FORMAT-IT_IT.format
CONFIG.name: IT DATE FORMAT
CONFIG.description: Date format used while displaying dates according to user current locale.Format attribute is for old presentation mechanism, see java.text.SimpleDateFormat for details, while extJsFormat is for ExtJs client, that use another standard, see http://extjs.com/deploy/dev/docs/. IF YOU CHANGE ONE FORMAT YOU MUST CHANGE THE OTHER ONE ACCORDINGLY.

CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.DATE-FORMAT-EN_US.format
CONFIG.name: US DATE FORMAT
CONFIG.description: Date format used while displaying dates according to user current locale.Format attribute is for old presentation mechanism, see java.text.SimpleDateFormat for details, while extJsFormat is for ExtJs client, that use another standard, see http://extjs.com/deploy/dev/docs/. IF YOU CHANGE ONE FORMAT YOU MUST CHANGE THE OTHER ONE ACCORDINGLY.

CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.DATE-FORMAT-FR_FR.format
CONFIG.name: FR DATE FORMAT
CONFIG.description: Date format used while displaying dates according to user current locale.Format attribute is for old presentation mechanism, see java.text.SimpleDateFormat for details, while extJsFormat is for ExtJs client, that use another standard, see http://extjs.com/deploy/dev/docs/. IF YOU CHANGE ONE FORMAT YOU MUST CHANGE THE OTHER ONE ACCORDINGLY.

CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.DATE-FORMAT-ES_ES.format
CONFIG.name: ES DATE FORMAT
CONFIG.description: Date format used while displaying dates according to user current locale.Format attribute is for old presentation mechanism, see java.text.SimpleDateFormat for details, while extJsFormat is for ExtJs client, that use another standard, see http://extjs.com/deploy/dev/docs/. IF YOU CHANGE ONE FORMAT YOU MUST CHANGE THE OTHER ONE ACCORDINGLY.

CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.TIMESTAMP-FORMAT.format
CONFIG.name: TIMESTAMP FORMAT
CONFIG.description: TimeStamp Format of SpagoBI DB

CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.TIMESTAMP-FORMAT.extJsFormat
CONFIG.name: EXTJS TIMESTAMP FORMAT
CONFIG.description: TimeStamp Format of SpagoBI DB

CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.ORGANIZATIONAL-UNIT.getHierarchiesQuery
CONFIG.name: getHierarchiesQuery
CONFIG.valueCheck: SELECT distinct store_country as HIERARCHY, ' ' as COMPANY FROM store

CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.ORGANIZATIONAL-UNIT.getOUsQuery
CONFIG.name: getOUsQuery
CONFIG.valueCheck: SELECT distinct a.store_state as name, a.store_state as code FROM store a union select b.store_city as name, b.store_city as code from store b union select c.store_name as name , c.store_name as code from store c

CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.ORGANIZATIONAL-UNIT.getRootByHierarchy
CONFIG.name: getRootByHierarchy
CONFIG.valueCheck: SELECT distinct store_country as code, store_country as name FROM store where store_country = ?

CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.ORGANIZATIONAL-UNIT.getChildrenByLevel
CONFIG.name: getChildrenByLevel
CONFIG.valueCheck: select distinct ! as code, ! as name from store where store_country = ?

CONFIG.name: SPAGOBI.UPLOAD.MAX_FILE_SIZE_MB

CONFIG.label: DOCUMENT.EXPORTING.PDF.FRONT_PAGE
CONFIG.name: Front page for document exporting as PDF
CONFIG.description: Absolute path to the PDF front page to be used by the PDF Export. It MUST be a PDF with a single page inside it. Leave it blank to user the Knowage default one.

CONFIG.label: DOCUMENT.EXPORTING.PDF.BACK_PAGE
CONFIG.name: Back page for document exporting as PDF
CONFIG.description: Absolute path to the PDF back page to be used by the PDF Export. It MUST be a PDF with a single page inside it. Leave it blank to user the Knowage default one.

CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.SPAGOBI_HOST_SYSTEMVAR
CONFIG.name: SPAGOBI HOST SYSTEM VARIABLE NAME
CONFIG.description: The name of the system variable that contains the HOST

CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.RESOURCE_PATH_SYSTEMVAR_NAME
CONFIG.name: RESOURCE PATH SYSTEM VARIABLE NAME
CONFIG.description: The name of the system variable that contains the RESOURCE PATH

CONFIG.name: Customized database functions
CONFIG.description: List of customized functions for DB

CONFIG.label: KNOWAGE.WORKSPACE_SHOW_GRID
CONFIG.name: Show grid view as default in workspace
CONFIG.description: Show grid view as default in workspace

CONFIG.label: document.execution.startAutomatically
CONFIG.name: Document execution automatic start
CONFIG.description: If true, when opening a document, it will be executed automatically in case no mandatory drivers are missing

CONFIG.label: internal.security.login.checkForMaxFailedLoginAttempts
CONFIG.name: Max failed login attempts filter
CONFIG.description: Enable filter for max value of failed login attempts

CONFIG.label: internal.security.login.maxFailedLoginAttempts
CONFIG.name: Max failed login attempts
CONFIG.description: Specify max value of failed login attempts before account locking

CONFIG.label: internal.nodejs.chromium.export.path
CONFIG.name: NodeJS Export script path
CONFIG.description: Path of the export script for NodeJS

CONFIG.label: internal.exporting.pdf.viewportWidth
CONFIG.name: Viewport width for PDF
CONFIG.description: Integer value that set the viewport width of Chromium: used to resize the content printed on PDF.

CONFIG.label: internal.exporting.pdf.viewportHeight
CONFIG.name: Viewport height for PDF
CONFIG.description: Integer value that set the viewport height of Chromium: used to resize the content printed on PDF.

CONFIG.label: internal.exporting.pdf.viewportDeviceScaleFactor
CONFIG.name: Viewport device scale factor for PDF
CONFIG.description: Double value that set the viewport device scale factor of Chromium: used to increase the resolution printed on PDF.

CONFIG.label: internal.exporting.pdf.printScale
CONFIG.name: Print scale for PDF
CONFIG.description: Floating point value between 0.0 and 1.0 to set the scale of the content before printing onto PDF

CONFIG.label: internal.exporting.pdf.landscape
CONFIG.name: Landscape printing for PDF
CONFIG.description: Boolean value (true or false) to set landscape mode for PDF printing.

CONFIG.label: python.default.environment.url
CONFIG.name: Default python address
CONFIG.description: Default IP address and port for python engine.

CONFIG.label: r.default.environment.url
CONFIG.name: Default R address
CONFIG.description: Default IP address and port for R engine.

CONFIG.label: KNOWAGE.RESOURCE.EXPORT.FOLDER.CLEANING_PERCENTAGE
CONFIG.name: KNOWAGE.RESOURCE.EXPORT.FOLDER.CLEANING_PERCENTAGE
CONFIG.description: Resource export folder cleaning percentage (0 - 100). Default 30.

CONFIG.label: KNOWAGE.RESOURCE.EXPORT.FOLDER.MAX_FOLDER_SIZE
CONFIG.name: KNOWAGE.RESOURCE.EXPORT.FOLDER.MAX_FOLDER_SIZE
CONFIG.description: Resource export folder cleaning max folder size (byte). Default 10737418240.

CONFIG.label: KNOWAGE.DASHBOARD.EXPORT.EXCEL.STREAMING_WINDOW_SIZE
CONFIG.name: Apache POI streaming mode window size
CONFIG.description: The number of Excel rows that are kept in memory before flushing.

CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.DATASET.SOLR.FACET_LIMIT
CONFIG.name: SPAGOBI.DATASET.SOLR.FACET_LIMIT
CONFIG.description: Limit the buckets count when Solr dataset execute facet query (-1 for unlimited)

CONFIG.label: SPAGOBI.DATASET.REST.TIMEOUT
CONFIG.name: SPAGOBI.DATASET.REST.TIMEOUT
CONFIG.description: Timeout in milliseconds of a REST call using the REST client

CONFIG.label: KNOWAGE.DOWNLOAD.POLLING.TIME
CONFIG.name: Download Polling time interval
CONFIG.description: Polling time interval in ms to refresh the download list in menu. Set to 0 to disable.

CONFIG.label: dataset.preview.clientpagination.maxrows
CONFIG.name: Maximum rows number for front-end table pagination
CONFIG.description: Maximum rows number for front-end table pagination. Default is 5000

CONFIG.label: KNOWAGE.WSEVENTCLEANJOB.PERIOD
CONFIG.name: SBI_WS_EVENT records' validity time period
CONFIG.description: Time period of validity of records into SBI_WS_EVENT in seconds

CONFIG.name: KNOWAGE.DATAPREP.LIVY_HOST
CONFIG.description: The URL where Apache Livy is listening

CONFIG.label: KNOWAGE.AUDIT_ENABLED
CONFIG.name: KNOWAGE.AUDIT_ENABLED
CONFIG.description: Enables audit table updating

CONFIG.name: KNOWAGE.AUDIT_DATA_RETENTION
